key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and geopolitical tensions
High dependence on IoT market growth, making it susceptible to economic fluctuations
Intense competition from major semiconductor players and emerging IoT startups
Regulatory and compliance risks related to data privacy and environmental standards
Workforce reductions impacting employee morale and productivity
controversies: 10% workforce layoff in November 2023, potentially affecting employee morale
Potential supply chain disruptions due to geopolitical tensions and lockdowns in Shenzhen, China
environmental_issues: Compliance with evolving environmental standards may increase operational costs
social_issues: Workforce reductions and potential impact on employee morale
Commitment to anti-slavery and human trafficking practices, which is positive but requires ongoing investment
governance_issues: Need to manage regulatory compliance effectively to avoid legal and financial repercussions
